summary: The owner of a strip club decide to create a stripper academy, where anyone can enter and learn to dance like a pro, but only a few will be selected as strippers.
cast: Richard Tyson|Katie Cleary|Vincent Foster|Gabriel Pimentel|Julie Costello|Shawnie Costello|Ciera Rose Allen|Jenae Altschwager|Amanda Lynne|Shelly Varod|Rachel Leigh Anderson|Rhonda Lord|Robert Amstler|Monique La Barr|Patrick Rutnam|James Di Giacomo|Menamy Mitanes|Miranda Kwok|Louella Boquiren|Francesca Cecil|Tabitha Taylor|Tina Jonsdottir|Thaddeus Young|Elizabeth Hara|David Miech|Ben O'Rourke|Jeremy Hall|Renee Santos|Christina Fandino|Isabelle Salsa|Kathryn Le|Sajen Corona|Elizabeth Novotny|Eric La Barr|Johnny Nicoletti|Charles Anteby|Domiziano Arcangeli|Don Baldaramos|Vanessa Brenton|Hilda Costello|Daniel Murphy|Mike Pish|Douglas Mauldin|Draper Mauldin|Becky Flynn|Gill Garci|Vanessa Kay|Jerel Taylor
title: Stripper Academy
